document_data.mainbody: '''Tsarn Tombs''' was a hilly region near [[Scornubel]], which held an old burial ground.
document_data.Geography: The region was full of rolling hills, and was bordered on the north and east by a forest. There was a brook close by, and roads to the west that led to the water. One of the hilltops had a number of standing stones, serving as tombs. There were mountains northwest and northeast.
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|1357}}, [[Tessaril Winter]] led [[Shandril Shessair]] and [[Narm Tamaraith]] to [[Tsarn Tombs]] through the [[Tombgate]]. [[Sharantyr]] later teleported there with a token, and was in turn attacked.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: One of the graves had been painted with a message reading "Beware: the Dead Walk", not yet weathered beyond legibility as of late {{yearlink|1357}}.
